subject: fix(types): add 'seed' to DebugSource union type
body:
seedService uses debugLog with source 'seed', but the DebugSource type
union in debugLog.ts did not include it. Added 'seed' to the union and
the corresponding color entry in DebugPill's SOURCE_COLORS map.

Tags: types, debug, seed
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: documentation
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_016xsjTMjavoQa1P26ivfZ6A
title: add 'seed' to DebugSource union type
